title: Margarita
description: Classic and refreshing virgin cocktail that can be made in 10 minutes. It’s made from only 5 ingredients.

title: Pink Señorita
description: Like a margarita with a softer, cuter side, the Señorita ditches limes for pink lemonade and lemon juice.

title: Gin and Tonic
description: This drink is made with lime juice, gin, tonic, and a little cucumber. It’s super refreshing and full of flavor!

title: RoseMary Grapefruit
description: It’s a light drink, and it works for brunch or dinner time sipping. The herbal notes of the rosemary mix so well with the citrusy burst of grapefruit and soda.

title: Maracujá Mojito
description: Refreshing cocktail that combines tropical fruits with lime and mint for perfect drink for hot summer nights.

title: PassionFruit Paloma
description: t is a tequila-based cocktail that is traditionally mixed with fresh lime juice, and a grapefruit-flavored soda.

title: Sparkling Strawberry Sangria
description: This drink has 5 ingredients and is the perfect cocktail to serve at all your parties! Light and refreshing!

title: Tropical Rosé Aperol Spritz Cocktail
description: Its light, refreshing, delicious and perfect for hot summer afternoons.
